story:
¿Qué?

Encuentro con la sombra combina una trama de acción, el secuestro de un muchacho y sus intentos de fuga, con otra psicológica: la maduración de la personalidad de este como consecuencia de la experiencia vivida.

Encuentro con la sombra sigue los pasos de Eduardo, un joven de dieciséis años; hijo único de un empresario de éxito, viudo tras un accidente que se llevó a su esposa seis años atrás. Eduardo vive con su padre y con un séquito de empleados domésticos (cocinera, doncella, chófer) con los que se comporta de un modo caprichoso, mordaz y tiránico, consciente de su posición de poder.

Eduardo es víctima de un secuestro, que lo lleva a pasar meses encerrado en un sótano con la única compañía de sus captores. Este tiempo le servirá para vivir unos cambios fundamentales en su carácter, en lo que es realmente el tema de la novela: una trama de madurez y, quizás, también redención.

¿Quiénes?

Tandaia es una joven editorial con voluntad de cambio, de dar la alternativa a autores que no la encuentran en otro lugar, con nuevas y refrescantes ideas como es el crowdfunding.

De este modo eres tú, ahora que te estás planteando cómo colaborar, el que decide si la obra que te presentamos verá la luz pasando a formar parte de nuestro catálogo... porque consideramos al lector parte fundamental del proceso.

Hoy te presentamos a Mauro Zorrilla.

Nacido en Bilbao en 1945, al calor de las primeras bombas atómicas, en un país por entonces triste que quizás le hizo creer que era en todas partes así. Diez años en colegios religiosos que no le empujaron a comulgar con lo que aquellos predicaban, y el natural pragmatismo bilbaíno lo hizo estudiar Económicas. Fundó una empresa que sobrevivió hasta sus treinta y seis años, pero entonces ya era consciente de que quería otra cosa.

Había estado en un grupo de teatro unos cuantos años, participado en el partido no muy político del Profesor  Tierno Galván, y se había metido en rollos diversos que tenían la fatal semejanza de acabar siempre mal... y a todo ello se sumó que el mundo de la empresa no era lo suyo. Así que no le quedó más remedio que hacerse escritor, que es lo que quería ser desde que, a sus catorce años, su padre le regaló una Smith-Corona de quinta o sexta mano.

Tenía una cierta práctica en la escritura de cuentos y se atrevió con una novela, que desechó por las muchas deficiencias de su estructura. Luego se engolfó con otra, que tuvo la suerte de publicar en Editorial Debate (Vida y Familia de Lucas Nofuentes) y la cosa ha seguido así hasta ahora; ha publicado novelas, cuentos, teatro, poesía y también guiones para cine, televisión e incluso para comic.

Mauro Zorrilla es, sin duda, un todoterreno de la escritura...

¿Cómo?

Para arrancar el proyecto nos hemos fijado como objetivo 800€; esta es la cantidad que recaudaríamos si alrededor de cuarenta mecenas se hiciesen, cada cual, con un ejemplar de esta primera edición.

  • Teniendo acceso a las galeradas de edición.
  • Recibiendo un ejemplar semanas antes de la salida al mercado de la obra.
  • Si bien, también podrías ver tu nombre en los agradecimientos aportando un poco más.

Los fondos recaudados, se utilizarán para sacar adelante esta primera edición de Encuentro con la sombra que saldría pocas semanas después a la venta.

Además...

Sabemos que son tiempos difíciles, también nosotros los sufrimos, y es posible que no te encuentres en disposición de apoyarnos con tu mecenazgo en estos momentos... pero esperamos que si esto te ha llegado al alma, incluso si tal vez conoces en persona al autor, trates de difundir esta campaña (facebook, twitter, blogger, boca-oreja... ) para que alcancemos nuestra meta y Mauro Zorrilla vea publicada su obra.

Gracias por vuestro tiempo.

story:
Update: The Book Has Launched!

Visit www.better-than-college.com to learn more and order a copy!

Now, back to the original campaign text:

Hi everyone! Below you'll find a detailed description of my project. If you're short on time, please read "In a Nutshell" and then jump between bolded sections. Thank you!  -Blake

***Also, don't miss the "Updates" tab (above) to find important news!***

 

In a Nutshell...

Hi, I'm Blake. I've written an awesome book manuscript (here's an excerpt) that provides a genuine alternative to the overpriced college experience—but I need your help to publish it.

In a nutshell, this fundraiser will help me to create a top-notch book and help you get a great pre-order deal! I will directly invest the money that I raise in the editing, design, printing, and other up-front costs necessary to bring the book to life.

When you contribute to this campaign, you'll receive a package of unique "perks." (You can browse these on the right). Most of these will only be available through IndieGoGo! Find a package that you like, click "Claim This Perk," and in a few months, when the book is published, I'll send you the perks. Easy!

Beyond the perks, however, your contribution will fuel the spread of a vitally important idea: That you can build a successful life without a four-year degree. Too many people believe that "college=success" and therefore everyone should take out $20,000+ in student loans. We must change that idea—and together, we will. 

To learn more about the book, please continue reading below.


 

Why is College Overrated?

Once, a long long time ago, a 4-year college degree guaranteed a stable economic future. 

Today, a 4-year degree offers $25,000 in student loan debt, a spot on mom’s couch, and your very own place in the Craigslist breadline. 

If you're supremely confident that you'd like to enter a licensed profession (doctor, lawyer, etc.), do Ph.D.-level research science, or work for a big traditional institution (e.g. an investment bank or the government), then you should go to the best college that you can get into.

But if, on the other hand:

  • you suspect that becoming a doctor, lawyer, architect, scientist, professor, or banker is really somebody else’s goal for you,
  • you’re interested in the liberal arts, studio art, technology, starting your own business, or working with your hands,
  • you suspect that you haven’t seen enough of the world to really focus in college,
  • you’re mostly interested in the social aspect of college,
  • or you’re simply unsure about everything,

...then postponing, leaving, or skipping college might be the best thing you ever do. 

We've heard a lot of these arguments over the past few years. It's easy to find an article or book that (rightly) criticizes college. But:

There's no book that provides a concrete alternative path for young adults facing the college decision right now.

To make a smart decision about going to college (and taking on life-crushing student loans), young adults need a genuine alternative to college: one that provides real-world skills, financial security, and a sense of meaning. That alternative already exists, but no one has described it well. That's where you & I come in.

 

The Book

Better Than College: How to Build a Successful Life Without a Four-Year Degree is a step-by-step guide to postponing, leaving, or skipping college. The book describes how to harness the power of self-directed learning to give yourself a higher education in five strategic steps:

  1. Build Self-Knowledge
  2. Give Yourself Assignments
  3. Create & Share Value
  4. Find Support
  5. Market Yourself

Better Than College also features:

  • interviews with young adults (many of whom unschooled as teens) who deliberately decided to skip college in favor of self-directed learning
  • a discussion of the modern economic trends that demand a self-directed, entrepreneurial approach to learning
  • guidance for getting hired without a college degree
  • tons of specific advice and tips for beginning your self-directed higher education today 

The book will be lean (< 150 pages)—no fluff—and focus exclusively on providing young people (and those of any age) with the most useful, practical, and well-reasoned insight for choosing self-directed learning over institutional education.

To get a taste for the book, check out this excerpt from the preface!

 

What I Have, What I Need, and Where the Money Will Go

As of February 2012, I have:

  • Performed all interviews
  • Written a preliminary manuscript
  • Submitted the manuscript to 20+ associates in the world of alternative education, received a ton of useful feedback, and revised the manuscript accordingly
That's a good start, but it's a long way from a clean, polished final product. With the money I raise through this campaign, I will purchase:
  • Line-by-line editing by two different professional editors 
  • Professional interior design (i.e. typesetting)
  • Professional cover design (e-book + physical book)
  • Professional e-book conversion (to .mobi for Kindle and .ePub for Sony, iBooks, Nook, etc.)
  • ISBN, copyright, and Library of Congress registration
  • Proof printing and the initial print run to send to IndieGoGo contributers
  • Additional copies of the book to send to alternative education pioneers and potential reviewers
  • Postage & supplies necessary to mail everything
 
These are the investments necessary to produce a top-notch book—and they're pricey. By raising $8500 or more by March 19th, 2012, I can secure the editorial, design, and printing services necessary to create a professional book that influential people will take seriously and then further spread its message.

***See the "Updates" tab for a detailed breakdown of where the money goes.***

 

An Indie Publishing Venture

I released my first book, College Without High School, through a traditional publisher. That was a positive experience that taught me what goes into professional publishing. This time, I'm independently publishing my book in order to retain full rights to the work. That way I can give away free copies to those who need it most, offer special discounts, and run innovative fundraisers like this one! By supporting this campaign you're supporting a 100% indie publishing venture!

If I don't meet my $8500 goal, I will still move forward with the project and use whatever funds raised to publish and ship the best possible book. But more funds will equal a better book and an important message spread farther!

 

When Will You Receive the Book?

The planned release date for the book is June 6, 2012. As an IndieGoGo contributer, your books will ship one week early, on May 30th. (Please allow for slight date shifts due to unforeseen production factors.)

 

About the Author

For almost a decade, I've dedicated my life toward building solutions in alternative education. You can learn more about my work on BlakeBoles.com, but here are the relevant highlights:

  • I'm the author of College Without High School (2009, New Society Publishers). 
  • I'm the founder and director of Unschool Adventures, an international trip leading company for teenage unschoolers. 
  • In late 2010 I started a blog called Zero Tuition College to explore the strategies that would eventually become this book.
  • In May 2011 I raised $2300 on IndieGoGo to build the Zero Tuition College community website: the first-ever social network for college-level self-directed learners. It currently has over 500 members, and we're planning a major overhaul next month.
  • I'm an avid backpacker, trail runner, and international traveler. But most of all, I love working with young adult self-directed learners. Check out my 2011—it was a bit crazy, packed with all of the above. 
You can find me in-person this March at the InHome Conference near Chicago and the Wide Sky Days Conference near San Diego in September. 
 

Other Ways You Can Participate

If you agree with this book's vision, I'd love your help in spreading the word! Please use the "Share" tools at the top of this page to tell your online communities about the campaign.

Even if you can't contribute right now, telling just a few friends about this campaign will help immensely!

If you would like to arrange a custom perk package that you don't see listed, please e-mail me and we'll work something out: yourstruly@blakeboles.com.

Join my private mailing list to receive e-mail updates on the book's progress and free goodies!

Finally, when you contribute, please click "Receive emails with updates from the campaign owner"—I'll be posting excerpts, videos, and more cool stuff through the IndieGoGo "Updates" feature.

 

Thanks for reading, and together let's change higher education.

story:
¿Qué?

El escotoma positivo habla de las limitaciones afectivas, reales o autoimpuestas, y de la búsqueda de la felicidad en un mundo frío y aséptico; muy parecido a este en el que vivimos.

Un escotoma es una zona de ceguera temporal o permanente: una mancha en la retina que tapa parte del campo de visión. Se dice que es negativo cuando su portador no sabe que lo padece: desconoce que cuando mira hay parte de la realidad que no puede ver. En cambio, el escotoma es positivo cuando la persona se hace consciente de su discapacidad y acepta que su imagen del mundo es irreal o, simplemente, parcial.

Daniel es un chico homosexual al que le cuesta relacionarse, a pesar de que trabaja como dependiente en una panadería de un barrio malagueño. Clara vive en un pueblo de la Axarquía, se maldice cada día ante el espejo de su habitación debido a su extrema delgadez y ha aprendido que tiene que ser buena. Ambos tienen mucho en común: la soledad y el desamparo les hieren y anhelan que un hombre les ame. El deseo de ser queridos a cualquier precio les llevará a autoengañarse y a aceptar la violencia, el sufrimiento y los malos tratos como parte de una vida cuyo mapa completo no alcanzan a comprender. Descubrirán que las personas nos acostumbramos a todo, incluso a vivir en un infierno, con tal de obtener unas migajas de algo parecido al amor.

Los escotomas suelen producirse por una lesión. Todos tenemos escotomas: nuestras heridas y nuestra herencia nos llevan a negar la realidad para no sufrir. Clara y Daniel, los protagonistas de esta historia, tendrán que pagar un precio muy alto para aprender que sólo conocer quienes somos y aceptar de donde venimos podrá salvarnos de nosotros mismos.

¿Quiénes?

Tandaia es una joven editorial con voluntad de cambio, de dar la alternativa a autores que no la encuentran en otro lugar, con nuevas y refrescantes ideas como es el crowdfunding.

De este modo eres tú, ahora que te estás planteando cómo colaborar, el que decide si la obra que te presentamos verá la luz pasando a formar parte de nuestro catálogo... porque consideramos al lector parte fundamental del proceso.

Hoy te presentamos a Carlos G. García.

Nacido en Málaga, en 1982, las palabras siempre fueron su mejor refugio y su más apreciado recurso. A los trece años ganó un concurso de relatos y su maestra de Lengua anunció: “Vaya, vaya, parece que tenemos aquí a un escritor”. Desde entonces no ha dejado de escribir novelas, ensayos, historias cortas y artículos de muy diversa temática y tono.

Es licenciado en Periodismo y diplomado en Trabajo Social y está a punto de finalizar sus estudios de Arteterapia Humanista Gestalt. Se ha especializado en violencia de género e intragénero y actualmente colabora con Asociación Deméter por la Igualdad, una entidad que atiende a las hijas e hijos de las mujeres víctimas de malos tratos. También forma parte del equipo docente del posgrado Educar en la no Violencia de la UNED.

En 2009 publicó el conjunto de artículos de humor Amar en tiempos de estómagos revueltos y en 2010 y 2011 las novelas Multitud y Entrada + Consumición (Stonewall). Recientemente, ha visto la luz su investigación sobre violencia intragénero La huella de la violencia en parejas del mismo sexo, (Gomylex, 2017). Con El escotoma positivo quiere compartir lo más honesto, delicado y descarnado de sí mismo.

¿Cómo?

Para arrancar el proyecto nos hemos fijado como objetivo 920€; esta es la cantidad que recaudaríamos si alrededor de cuarenta mecenas se hiciesen, cada cual, con un ejemplar de esta primera edición.

  • Teniendo acceso a las galeradas de edición.
  • Recibiendo un ejemplar semanas antes de la salida al mercado de la obra.
  • Si bien, también podrías ver tu nombre en los agradecimientos aportando un poco más.

Los fondos recaudados, se utilizarán como una ayuda para sacar adelante esta primera edición de El escotoma positivo que saldría semanas después a la venta.

Además...

Sabemos que son tiempos difíciles, también nosotros los sufrimos, y es posible que no te encuentres en disposición de apoyarnos con tu mecenazgo en estos momentos... pero esperamos que si esto te ha llegado al alma, incluso si tal vez conoces en persona al autor, trates de difundir esta campaña (facebook, twitter, blogger, boca-oreja... ) para que alcancemos nuestra meta y Carlos G. García vea publicada su obra.

Gracias por vuestro tiempo.
story_txt:
¿Qué?
El escotoma positivo habla de las limitaciones afectivas, reales o autoimpuestas, y de la búsqueda de la felicidad en un mundo frío y aséptico; muy parecido a este en el que vivimos.
Un escotoma es una zona de ceguera temporal o permanente: una mancha en la retina que tapa parte del campo de visión. Se dice que es negativo cuando su portador no sabe que lo padece: desconoce que cuando mira hay parte de la realidad que no puede ver. En cambio, el escotoma es positivo cuando la persona se hace consciente de su discapacidad y acepta que su imagen del mundo es irreal o, simplemente, parcial.
Daniel es un chico homosexual al que le cuesta relacionarse, a pesar de que trabaja como dependiente en una panadería de un barrio malagueño. Clara vive en un pueblo de la Axarquía, se maldice cada día ante el espejo de su habitación debido a su extrema delgadez y ha aprendido que tiene que ser buena. Ambos tienen mucho en común: la soledad y el desamparo les hieren y anhelan que un hombre les ame. El deseo de ser queridos a cualquier precio les llevará a autoengañarse y a aceptar la violencia, el sufrimiento y los malos tratos como parte de una vida cuyo mapa completo no alcanzan a comprender. Descubrirán que las personas nos acostumbramos a todo, incluso a vivir en un infierno, con tal de obtener unas migajas de algo parecido al amor.
Los escotomas suelen producirse por una lesión. Todos tenemos escotomas: nuestras heridas y nuestra herencia nos llevan a negar la realidad para no sufrir. Clara y Daniel, los protagonistas de esta historia, tendrán que pagar un precio muy alto para aprender que sólo conocer quienes somos y aceptar de donde venimos podrá salvarnos de nosotros mismos.

story:
The Entryway

My name is Rob Queen, writer and teacher. When I'm not teaching, I'm writing. When I'm not writing, I'm teaching. This current dual career came at the end of over a dozen years in equine services. It was partially my previous career with horses that spawned this tale, especially as my love for beasts is not limited to horses, but stretches to just about every type of animal (minus mosquitoes. Not much a fan of them, I'll admit). The other thing that influenced Escape from the Spotlight was my love of a good superhero story. 

Combine the two elements, and Escape from the Spotlight was born. This would be the third published book written by myself, following my The Twelve Cataclysms: Protasis and $wamped, which I co-wrote with James Lillie. 

Simply put, I love story-telling as much as a cat loves changing its mind when it begs to have its belly rubbed. Indiegogo is a medium for the execution of my enduring love of story-telling, one that I used before to raise funds to publish The Twelve Cataclysms. This particular campaign has two goals: to bring Escape from the Spotlight into the spotlight of publication, and to help set up the funding for ongoing tales in this world where individuals are more than just human.

 

The Exhibit

This is not a Young Adult novel. It is an exploration of life. In the grand tradition of DC and Marvel, Escape from the Spotlight is written as if Patty Jenkins Christopher Nolan was in the director's seat.

Doran is young, but it's an important time in life that, should he survive, will invariably define many aspects of his future. Though Doran is the primary exhibit, he is not alone. Off the beaten path, like in any Sanctuary, there are a number of exhibits that showcase the teenage years. Through the hi-energy school editor Mia, the charismatic Reed, and the athletic Mo, the story explores the nuance and problems that not only come with the teenage years, but also the problems - personal and peer - that come with powers. 

As anyone who has spent time with animals would know, each animal is a unique entity that brings their own sense of self to the page. Escape from the Spotlight explores the deeper sense of consequence and informed decision-making, all wrapped up in an adventure of discovery and mystery.

I have shared the first chapter of this novel for your reading pleasure. Check it out, and come back to contribute!

 

The Administration 

To provide this book with its escape from concept to the liberation of publication, it will need several things. 

The first is the cover. Jean-Pascal Leclerc Kegle has done a great job with the cover, but he needs payment. Similarly, HdE will need his rate for his excellent lettering on the final product. Following the remuneration to these talents, the book will need several things for itself. Though self-publication via Amazon.com's Createspace is an affordable entity, it is not free. Layout, formatting, editing, and publishing costs all stack up. In addition to this will be the marketing, which will carry the author to a number of reading venues to help introduce the story to a wider audience. One particular means of marketing is its submission into some fiction competitions, most notably The Indie Book Awards, which would give Escape from the Spotlight a significant amount of visibility should it be successful.

One other area that your funding will navigate is yourselves. Your funding will find its way back to you in the manner of the exclusive perks that are mentioned on this campaign page. For more details as to what those Perks are, just take a look at the side of the page and start thinking about how nice it would be to have a limited edition flash drive, or a poster of the cover signed by the author and cover artist, or even the main event - your very own copy of Escape from the Spotlight. 

 

Upkeep

As a special perk, any contribution of $100 or greater will lead to a worthwhile cause outside of just creating great art. As mentioned above, animals are incredibly important to me, and with larger contributions, you will be aiding me in the publication of the book as well as providing a donation towards the care and upkeep of animals. How does that work? I will be using no less than half of the contribution and collecting it into a single donation to the animal charity (compiled from the contributions of all of you) from the "Trustees of the Titus Sanctuary." I will be  updating details regarding its distribution as it happens, as well as invite suggestions for the charity. In that way, we can keep a running dialogue of distribution to so as to figure out the best means of making sure the beasties are best cared for. 

 

Contingencies

Animals are notorious for finding ways of creating havoc in our lives, and while we often forgive them for being the wonderful creatures they are, contingencies are nonetheless important. For this campaign, even if we don't reach our planned goal, your contribution will still net you the Perks that you contributed towards. From this end, your contribution will provide payment according to need: publication, perks, marketing. 

 

Feeding

Every contribution, whether $1 or $100, helps to reach our goal in 30 days. So, too, does getting the word out about this project! Even more than just monetarily, word-of-mouth and your excitement helps multiply the value of your support.

  • Please tell a friend, or 25 friends, or even a 100 friends, acquaintances and co-workers, clients, about Escape from the Spotlight!
  • Get the word out by phone, email, and by talking it up.
  • Post a message on your Facebook page.
  • Even better, post a link to the campaign video.
  • Tweet a link to this IndieGoGo page.
  • Share the image of the cover on Instagram!
  • Visit my website and blog to stay up-to-date on all my offerings.

*Some people are not yet familiar with the power of crowd-funding. Explain how it works and motivate someone to check out this campaign.

The Nutrients

This is the second crowd-funding campaign that I have set up. The first one, for The Twelve Cataclysms: Protasis was my first foray into the world of crowd-funding. This second time around, I feel more confident with regards to perks, limitations, possibilities, as well as overall security with this as a means of connecting to people.

The Animals

Like the animals who star in this adventure, this is a campaign that cannot survive without attention and nurturing. There is no fast-track to success, but with the help of supporters like you, that success can be reached, and opportunities for growth will present themselves. Just as Doran and his family occasionally have to do to keep their animal sanctuary solvent, I am standing under the spotlight of the show, asking for your help. Help bring the irony of this title to its very own spotlight, where it can stand tall and proud, successful of its own merit.

 

CONTESTS!

Check out the updates for news and details regarding these 3 special contests, which could land you in the higher Perk Bracket of the Vixen!

WEEK 1 - ANIMALS (10/8 to  10/15 24:00 PST)

Look at the perks. What do you think is the first animal that Doran Titus turns into in this novel? (see this for entry rules)

WEEK 2 - FREEDOM (10/17 to 10/22 24:00 PST)

With each contribution of $10 or more (the cost of two cups of Starbucks' coffee), you will be entered for the Sunday night drawing.  

WEEK 3 - ???

 

 

On behalf of myself and everyone in the Titus Sanctuary, many thanks!

story:
Story of My Book

Thinking Horizontally is a book about how to focus your entrepreneurial mindset on growing horizontally. Whether you are an existing business owner or planning a startup, this book will help to achieve success through a horizontal mindset and ideology.

My name is James Manske, and I am the author of Thinking Horizontally. I wrote this book because I have experienced continued success through the thought process of thinking horizontally during many years in business, which began at the age of ten. I have been fortunate enough to find multiple corollary options to expand sales, businesses, and growth.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover new ways to view your business or a new business you are looking to start by understanding how diversification in your industry works. I want you to consider this book as a pathway to seek out additional opportunities in your current field and simplify processes to grow your bottom line. By understanding the methods and mindset in this book, you will be able to break free from the thought processes that many originally believed were the only way to become successful in business.


FOR ALL:

Thinking Horizontally speaks to entrepreneurs and those seeking to start new businesses and those business owners who are feeling stagnant. If you are grappling with creating new revenue streams and a better future, this book will help you simplify your company processes in a new way.

Ultimately, I hope that Thinking Horizontally inspires reflection and fruitful dialogue, pressing into engaging questions like:

What areas of my company can I implement simplicity?

Where are there possible corollary opportunities that can be created?

How can I hire great talent and become more analytical in my business?

I look forward to exploring these questions and beyond with my readers. I believe discussing these answers and ideologies from successful individuals will change us all for the better.

 

Thinking Horizontally

The book is written in 3 parts.

Part 1 How We Got Here:
Contains the author’s note + chapters [1-3]. This section focuses on what separates successful entrepreneurs from the ordinary by exploring a focused mindset and the art of diversification. Without the proper focus or ability to think horizontally, you must realize that there is no better time to work on expansion than now. Time is of the essence when building success for the rest of your life.

Part 2 Principles of the Expansion Mindset:

Contains chapters [4-8]. In these chapters, you will learn how to explore corollary opportunities internally and externally for your business. Customers are also a big part of diversification. This section examines different ways to increase sales with your current clientele. You will also learn that by creating a rock-star team and focusing on the analytics, you will be able to easily implement new horizontal growth.

Part 3 How to Build the Expansion Mindset:

Contains chapters [9-11]. In this section, we discuss what makes you want to be better. What wants and goals do you have and how can horizontal thinking help you to achieve these dreams? What is holding you back in your current situation and how to utilize your skills to push out the negative, change your situation, and reach success? Guinio Valpone is a great example of how to achieve greatness. In his college years of living in his car to being able to pivot throughout his entrepreneurial journey, Guinio has built a very successful empire of tech companies that generate over nine-figures in sales.

 

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

The editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in April 2021.

The cover design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)

The layout design for the interior of my book (physical copy, e-book formats).

The copy editing for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.

The launch & promotion efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this spring of 2021.


When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish a paperback and e-book. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover and an audiobook.


I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when published.

Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book.

You will receive early access to the Author’s Note and other excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback.

You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.

You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.

And much more!

 

About the Author


James Manske is a self-start entrepreneur who has created income and businesses since he was ten years old. With over 18 years in the customer service industry, James has built several successful businesses in the Omaha metropolitan area. These businesses include a well-known lawn and landscape company with seven divisions that he started at age fifteen. James has also created a real estate investment company that provides housing to families in Omaha. He currently holds a real estate broker’s license in which he helps businesses find and secure commercial spaces. More recently he has co-founded a construction equipment manufacturing company that creates innovative machinery to help contractors to become more efficient in their industry. James has partnerships with other businesses which include a coffee roastery and an AI-driven employment tech company. His creative thought process and unique ability to envision industry-leading transformations make James an encyclopedia for all entrepreneurs.

James wrote this book to help others achieve the same success he achieved through simplicity and a creative thought process. By leveraging existing assets, he will share how to properly diversify your organization by utilizing corollary opportunities. James emphasizes the importance of thinking horizontally to reduce risk and create great success.

James and Cali, his 95-pound Golden Retriever/Great Pyrenees, both reside in Omaha, Nebraska. His passion for creative thought processes in businesses is considered a hobby in his eyes, and he loves to find unique ways to achieve success. When he is not building businesses, James enjoys traveling across all corners of the world where he appreciates exploring new foods, cultures, and history.

For more information, you can connect with James Manske at james.manske.andassociates@gmail.com

Also, find him on social media at
www.linkedin.com/in/james-manske-35011429/
https://www.facebook.com/james.manske.31
 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by including the cost of mailing and shipping the signed copies into each pre-order tier. The cost of shipping in the United States is included in the cost of your purchases. Note that international shipping is an additional cost that will be added at check-out.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.
 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Please share my pre-sale campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family, and network. Please use #thinkinghorizontally and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so we can help amplify your efforts.

You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page.

Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it via text or direct message on social media.

Thank you so much for all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
James Manske

The book is written in 3 parts.Part 1 How We Got Here:Contains the author’s note + chapters [1-3]. This section focuses on what separates successful entrepreneurs from the ordinary by exploring a focused mindset and the art of diversification. Without the proper focus or ability to think horizontally, you must realize that there is no better time to work on expansion than now. Time is of the essence when building success for the rest of your life.Part 2 Principles of the Expansion Mindset:
Contains chapters [4-8]. In these chapters, you will learn how to explore corollary opportunities internally and externally for your business. Customers are also a big part of diversification. This section examines different ways to increase sales with your current clientele. You will also learn that by creating a rock-star team and focusing on the analytics, you will be able to easily implement new horizontal growth.Part 3 How to Build the Expansion Mindset:
Contains chapters [9-11]. In this section, we discuss what makes you want to be better. What wants and goals do you have and how can horizontal thinking help you to achieve these dreams? What is holding you back in your current situation and how to utilize your skills to push out the negative, change your situation, and reach success? Guinio Valpone is a great example of how to achieve greatness. In his college years of living in his car to being able to pivot throughout his entrepreneurial journey, Guinio has built a very successful empire of tech companies that generate over nine-figures in sales. 
What I Need & What You'll Get This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:The editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in April 2021.
The cover design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)
The layout design for the interior of my book (physical copy, e-book formats).
The copy editing for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
The launch & promotion efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this spring of 2021.
When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish a paperback and e-book. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover and an audiobook.I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when published.
Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book.
You will receive early access to the Author’s Note and other excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback.
You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.
You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.
And much more! About the Author
James Manske is a self-start entrepreneur who has created income and businesses since he was ten years old. With over 18 years in the customer service industry, James has built several successful businesses in the Omaha metropolitan area. These businesses include a well-known lawn and landscape company with seven divisions that he started at age fifteen. James has also created a real estate investment company that provides housing to families in Omaha. He currently holds a real estate broker’s license in which he helps businesses find and secure commercial spaces. More recently he has co-founded a construction equipment manufacturing company that creates innovative machinery to help contractors to become more efficient in their industry. James has partnerships with other businesses which include a coffee roastery and an AI-driven employment tech company. His creative thought process and unique ability to envision industry-leading transformations make James an encyclopedia for all entrepreneurs.James wrote this book to help others achieve the same success he achieved through simplicity and a creative thought process. By leveraging existing assets, he will share how to properly diversify your organization by utilizing corollary opportunities. James emphasizes the importance of thinking horizontally to reduce risk and create great success.James and Cali, his 95-pound Golden Retriever/Great Pyrenees, both reside in Omaha, Nebraska. His passion for creative thought processes in businesses is considered a hobby in his eyes, and he loves to find unique ways to achieve success. When he is not building businesses, James enjoys traveling across all corners of the world where he appreciates exploring new foods, cultures, and history.For more information, you can connect with James Manske at james.manske.andassociates@gmail.com
Also, find him on social media atwww.linkedin.com/in/james-manske-35011429/https://www.facebook.com/james.manske.31 
Risks & Challenges The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by including the cost of mailing and shipping the signed copies into each pre-order tier. The cost of shipping in the United States is included in the cost of your purchases. Note that international shipping is an additional cost that will be added at check-out.The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship. Other Ways You Can Help Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:Please share my pre-sale campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family, and network. Please use #thinkinghorizontally and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so we can help amplify your efforts.
You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page.
Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it via text or direct message on social media.
Thank you so much for all of your love and support!Thanks again,James Manske

story:
Story of My Book

GODDIE  is a novel that looks at what happens when our lives are continuously interrupted. What happens to us when our lives get uprooted?  How do we sweep the fragments together and carve a path forward?  The reality is, no matter what happens to us, we never get to go back to the beginning.  We must all start....from the middle.   This book takes a personal and graphic look at a young teenage girl who watches her father and mother die.  She is sent to live in servitude with strangers and eventually escapes on a ship.  She survives only to be betrayed again, and again, ... and again.  It’s a tribute of perseverance in a life continuously interrupted by life.


--------------

My hope is that in reading this book, you will see the celebration of yourself and where you come from.  This novel should serve as both an encouragement and a reminder that GODDIE  lives in all of us.  It is my desire to show that just as our mothers and fathers did, we can survive too. The tenaciousness of our parents, sewn into our DNA, is alive and well.  The standard is there for all of us.  Let’s get up and get going.

The journey of this book meets the reader who lives at the crossroads of aspiration and anguish.  A time when classes ruled the masses, and simplicity and gratefulness were the tools of survival.  This book is for anyone who has had to leave everything they’ve ever known.  It’s for that person who went somewhere they’ve never been, to get something they’ve never had.  Goddie's masterclass examines the potency of Jamaican culture through the lens of loss, poverty, and discovery.  Witness the granular transition of a poor girl learning how to recover again, and again, ...and again.

Allow me to introduce you to GODDIE.  A novel based on a true story.

 

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be self-published in partnership with New Degree Press.  I am raising the publishing funds myself to own the book's creative rights and to invite readers on my journey.   I have set up various pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for final publication.  *Money raised will go towards the following:*


* The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in August 2021.
* The Cover Design of my book - The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!!
* The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats).
* The Copy Editing for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
* The Launch & Promotion efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this summer.


When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish.

When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition.

When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition and an audiobook!
 

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

  • A personally signed copy of my book when I publish,
  • Your name will appear in a special Acknowledgements Section of my book 
  • You will receive early access to the Introduction and other excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review them and give me early feedback.
  • The opportunity to help me select my cover,
  • Exclusive access to the Goddie podcast  release
  • Early access to the Goddie playlist on Apple Music and Spotify
  • A personal, handwritten thank-you note for pre-ordering my book,
  • A personalized bookmark featuring an excerpt from one of Goddie’s moments,
  • You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.
  • And more!

 

About the Author 

Robert Picart is an emerging non-fiction writer, cultural explorer, former missionary, community volunteer, and city explorer.

Born in the vibrant and diverse city of Toronto, Canada, Robert identified early his affinity for culture, music, and the company of good friends.  Forever the people watcher, he spent his early days hopping on and off the subway, discovering new frontiers, new flavors, and new friends.

Beyond the Zoom calls and writing activities, Robert can be found spending time with his family, enjoying coffee and a good book outside, or getting into some West Indian food in downtown Toronto or Atlanta, Georgia.

For more information, you can connect with Robert Picart at www.robertpicart.com and at @robertpicart.  #goddiebook

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by including the cost of mailing and shipping the signed copies into each pre-order tier. 

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the preordered copies are expected to ship.


Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Please share my pre-sale campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family, and network. Please use #goddiebook and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so that we can help amplify your efforts.
  • You can easily share my pre-sale campaign via Indiegogo at the top of the page.
  • Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it via text or direct message on social media.

Thank you so much for all of your love and support!  I literally could not do this with you.   I think you’re going to love this story.  I can’t wait for you to meet GODDIE.  

 

Thanks again,

Robert Picart
@robertpicart

story:
Short Summary

As a mother of five I have answered many questions. This book was born out of a conversation I had with my seven year old where he asked some very deep questions about life. The idea came quickly: I need to write a book for kids that can give them tools and messages to understand they have the most amazing qualities in themselves that can help them live and create their best life.
If kids could have an opportunity to hear the messages in this book regularly it could have such a positive impact on how they view themselves. My goal is to get this published in hardcover, paperback and ebook and into the hands of many parents and children with the hope of sparking mindfulness, self discovery and meaningful conversations. With your contribution we can make that happen!

 The illustrations are sweet and beautiful! 
I have had the good fortunate to work with Sara Wilcox, artist and very dear friend. I have known Sara since I was 12 and have always loved her joyous spirit, you will see this joy in the illustrations of I AM HERE


What We Need & What You Get

I AM HERE has been in the works for a little over a year, the story is written, the illustrations  are finished, It has received heart felt praises and is ready to be published!
The Goal is to Raise $5500 in 21 days!! We want to have it published and our first batch of books printed before the holidays. Time is of the essence! The funds raised in this campaign will help support the beginning of a beautiful book with beautiful messages geared to developing spiritual and emotional growth in kids.

Our goal is simple: 
$2500- covers the publishing package
$1500- covers marketing expenses
$1500- covers the first bulk order of I AM HERE

The Perks 
We would love it if you would make a contribution and for doing so we have some fun perks as our way of saying thank you....
Did you know the Author Lynette Gaona is a singer, songwriter and vocal coach?
Did you know the illustrator Sara Wilcox is an amazing henna artist and muralist?
together we can offer some very fun perks!

With your contribution we've got signed copies of I AM HERE hot off the presses, merchandise with the sweet cover illustration on it,  henna parties and live music! 

The Impact

With your help we will be able to get this book out into the world! Imagine how it could be if from a very early age you knew everything you needed to live your best life was inside you, no matter what the outside circumstances were. What an amazing world we could create and how loving we could be to one another.  
Every contribution will help us reach our goal! 


Other Ways You Can Help

Your support and help in spreading the word are truly appreciated. Tell everyone you know about I AM HERE and this campaign so we can reach as many kids as possible!

story:
¿Qué?

Los clanes de la serpiente es una novela de aventuras, en la línea de lo mejor de la literatura fantástica, con una trama de madurez como hilo conductor.

Cierra los ojos. Explora la oscuridad que hay dentro de ti. Te han enseñado bien; sabes que hay algo más… y que tiene mucho poder. Tyuni es una joven exploradora del clan del Lince que está a punto de cambiar el rumbo de su vida. Abandonará su hogar y se unirá al grupo de Temarek, otro muchacho, este del clan del Cangrejo, cuyo destino también está en juego. Guerreros, exploradores y chamanes componen la élite de la civilización nómada que Tyuni y Temarek descubrirán en la primera aventura de sus vidas. Adéntrate con ellos en un territorio hostil donde solo sobreviven aquellos que dominan los secretos de los espíritus.

¿Quiénes?

Tandaia es una editorial con voluntad de cambio, de publicar obras poco convencionales pero de indudable calidad, con nuevas y refrescantes ideas como es el emplear una campaña preventa para promocionar cada título cuando esta todavía se encuentra en proceso de edición.

De este modo eres tú, ahora que te estás planteando cómo colaborar, el que decide si la obra que te presentamos verá la luz pasando a formar parte de nuestro catálogo... porque consideramos al lector parte fundamental del proceso.

Hoy te presentamos a Kelsang Bas.

En lo más profundo del más inhóspito yermo, donde las colinas de Mordor… Qué va, no, solo es de Valencia. Kelsang Bas lleva escribiendo fantasía desde que tiene memoria. Aunque no es lo único que escribe, sus sesiones eternas de juegos de rol en su adolescencia han dejado una huella difícil de ignorar. Además de escribir y de jugar a rol, Kelsang se graduó en periodismo y en comunicación audiovisual. En la actualidad, Kelsang se dedica a viajar; explora el mundo y descubre sus diferentes culturas del mismo modo que los personajes de su novela.

Los clanes de la serpiente es la primera obra que publica. «Es lo único que he escrito hasta el momento que realmente vale la pena», reconoce. Combinando conocimientos de historia, de geografía, de antropología y del mundo interior que llevamos dentro, Los Clanes de la Serpiente presenta una realidad ficticia pero muy cercana a lo que somos y a lo que hemos sido. 

¿Por qué?

Y por aquí una muestra de lo que encontraréis en sus páginas:

«Tyuni cerró los ojos. Sabía que su padre estaba haciendo lo mismo. Siguió el ritmo de su respiración y se concentró en sentir el aire que llegaba a sus oídos. Sintió la brisa en sus orejas y en sus pómulos. Poco a poco, fue sintiendo todos los músculos de su cuerpo hasta que éstos se mezclaron con el entorno que leían sus oídos. Y, de forma repentina pero suave, su ser se asomó al mundo de los espíritus, donde el espíritu del Lince aguardaba su llegada.
          Fue un contacto breve, como siempre. Un mero roce. El mundo de los espíritus era un lugar ajeno, peligroso e incomprensible, y ahondar en sus profundidades podía tener consecuencias catastróficas para quien no seguía la estricta senda de los chamanes. Sin embargo, entrar en contacto con el espíritu Lince era no solo posible sino en ocasiones imperativo para los miembros del clan.
          De pronto, Tyuni sintió que el Lince estaba en ella. Lo sintió dentro de su pecho y comenzó a escuchar el entorno con el detalle que solo se podría conseguir con las orejas de un lince. Enseguida abrió los ojos. A sus oídos llegaba el lejanísimo sonido de pezuñas y de ruedas de madera sobre un camino rocoso. Se incorporó y buscó con la mirada, pero enseguida su padre la reprimió.
          —Abajo —pronunció su padre con la voz lejana y ausente de quien está aún en contacto con los espíritus. 
          Tyuni tuvo que esperar a que su padre terminara su ritual. En el clan se decía que, cuanto más anciano era uno, más tiempo dedicaba en el mundo de los espíritus. Tyuni duraba poquísimo en contacto con Lince.
          Cuando su padre abrió los ojos, estos brillaron con un resplandor amarillento. Con voz ronca, dijo:
          —Tú ve allá —y señaló la copa de la encina—. Súbete. Mi flecha será la primera».

¿Cómo?

Para arrancar el proyecto nos hemos fijado como objetivo 960€; esta es la cantidad que recaudaríamos si alrededor de cincuenta mecenas se hiciesen, cada cual, con un ejemplar de esta primera edición; en caso de no alcanzar el objetivo, Indiegogo devuelve las contribuciones una vez finalizada la campaña, en torno a 5-10 días después, sin ningún tipo de gasto ni comisión.

  • Teniendo acceso a las galeradas de edición.
  • Recibiendo un ejemplar semanas antes de la salida al mercado de la obra.
  • Si bien, también podrías ver tu nombre en los agradecimientos aportando un poco más.

Aviso para navegantes: La opción BACK IT es únicamente para realizar donaciones a la edición, por lo que no habrá comunicaciones posteriores en busca de datos de envío... cualquiera de las opciones válidas de reserva exige cumplimentar formulario para poder servir el pedido.

Además...

Sabemos que son tiempos difíciles, también nosotros los sufrimos, y es posible que no te encuentres en disposición de apoyarnos con tu mecenazgo en estos momentos... pero esperamos que si esto te ha llegado al alma, incluso si tal vez conoces en persona al autor, trates de difundir esta campaña (facebook, twitter, blogger, boca-oreja... ) para que alcancemos nuestra meta y Kelsang Bas vea publicada su obra.

Gracias por vuestro tiempo.

Política de Privacidad

Y por aquí una muestra de lo que encontraréis en sus páginas:
«Tyuni cerró los ojos. Sabía que su padre estaba haciendo lo mismo. Siguió el ritmo de su respiración y se concentró en sentir el aire que llegaba a sus oídos. Sintió la brisa en sus orejas y en sus pómulos. Poco a poco, fue sintiendo todos los músculos de su cuerpo hasta que éstos se mezclaron con el entorno que leían sus oídos. Y, de forma repentina pero suave, su ser se asomó al mundo de los espíritus, donde el espíritu del Lince aguardaba su llegada.          Fue un contacto breve, como siempre. Un mero roce. El mundo de los espíritus era un lugar ajeno, peligroso e incomprensible, y ahondar en sus profundidades podía tener consecuencias catastróficas para quien no seguía la estricta senda de los chamanes. Sin embargo, entrar en contacto con el espíritu Lince era no solo posible sino en ocasiones imperativo para los miembros del clan.          De pronto, Tyuni sintió que el Lince estaba en ella. Lo sintió dentro de su pecho y comenzó a escuchar el entorno con el detalle que solo se podría conseguir con las orejas de un lince. Enseguida abrió los ojos. A sus oídos llegaba el lejanísimo sonido de pezuñas y de ruedas de madera sobre un camino rocoso. Se incorporó y buscó con la mirada, pero enseguida su padre la reprimió.          —Abajo —pronunció su padre con la voz lejana y ausente de quien está aún en contacto con los espíritus.           Tyuni tuvo que esperar a que su padre terminara su ritual. En el clan se decía que, cuanto más anciano era uno, más tiempo dedicaba en el mundo de los espíritus. Tyuni duraba poquísimo en contacto con Lince.          Cuando su padre abrió los ojos, estos brillaron con un resplandor amarillento. Con voz ronca, dijo:          —Tú ve allá —y señaló la copa de la encina—. Súbete. Mi flecha será la primera».
¿Cómo?
Para arrancar el proyecto nos hemos fijado como objetivo 960€; esta es la cantidad que recaudaríamos si alrededor de cincuenta mecenas se hiciesen, cada cual, con un ejemplar de esta primera edición; en caso de no alcanzar el objetivo, Indiegogo devuelve las contribuciones una vez finalizada la campaña, en torno a 5-10 días después, sin ningún tipo de gasto ni comisión.

Teniendo acceso a las galeradas de edición.
Recibiendo un ejemplar semanas antes de la salida al mercado de la obra.
Si bien, también podrías ver tu nombre en los agradecimientos aportando un poco más.

Aviso para navegantes: La opción BACK IT es únicamente para realizar donaciones a la edición, por lo que no habrá comunicaciones posteriores en busca de datos de envío... cualquiera de las opciones válidas de reserva exige cumplimentar formulario para poder servir el pedido.
Además...
Sabemos que son tiempos difíciles, también nosotros los sufrimos, y es posible que no te encuentres en disposición de apoyarnos con tu mecenazgo en estos momentos... pero esperamos que si esto te ha llegado al alma, incluso si tal vez conoces en persona al autor, trates de difundir esta campaña (facebook, twitter, blogger, boca-oreja... ) para que alcancemos nuestra meta y Kelsang Bas vea publicada su obra.
Gracias por vuestro tiempo.
Política de Privacidad

story:
Story of My Book


The Zen of Business Acquisitions: As the baby boomer generation of financial advisors edges toward retirement, the industry has gone through an unprecedented wave of sales, mergers, and acquisitions. However, there are many misconceptions about these mergers and acquisitions, the way in which these companies are valued and the manner in which they are sold. I will provide you with my take on these issues, liberally sprinkled with wisdom gleaned through my 30 years of martial arts training.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover some of the clear misconceptions about the way in which these companies are valued. In this book, I hope to share the same sort of passion and excitement I have for acquisitions and show you how the philosophies learned through my martial arts training have helped me succeed. Ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to help you build a 5 to 10-year game plan to prepare your company for a sale or merger, putting you light years ahead of your competition.

In this book, you'll learn about the trends and insights from major players in our industry.

  • The vast majority of advisors - in fact over 80% - have no written succession or continuity plan.
  • Personal insights about my 15 years of experience in acquisitions
  • Classic mistakes first time buyers and sellers make, drawing on examples from various industries in corporate America.
  • Why playing the long game, and planning years in advance, is the ONLY way to win in this competitive environment.

The Zen of Business Acquisitions is a non-fiction book that speaks to financial services professionals and business owners who are looking at maximizing their company’s value when selling, and who would like to gain a competitive advantage over their peers.

The Book - The Zen of Business Acquisitions


The book is written in four parts.

Part [1] contains the introduction and the first four chapters. You will learn about new valuation software and key takeaways that are part of any merger or acquisition. You will also hear from one of the leading valuation firms about basic mistakes made by beginners, or “white belts” in the acquisition market.

Part [2] contains Chapters 5 through 8. This section covers some of the new trends in financing and some interesting martial arts analogies. You will also see how some of the changes in the industry are affecting the present and future buyers.

Part [3] contains Chapters 6 through 9. This section covers a successful acquisition and a contentious acquisition. In addition, it covers one executive’s journey as he re-tooled a major firm to make it more proactive and competitive. You will also learn about the challenges facing Amazon, Grubhub, DoorDash, and other meal delivery firms as they scramble to achieve profitability while also playing in the M&A space.

Part [4] contains chapters 7 through 10 and includes interviews with top advisors and firms that are involved with valuation and selling methodologies. There are some key takeaways to help you build and refine your practice along with stories about other non-financial companies that have done extensive work in the acquisitions area.


What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in December 2019.

The Cover Design of my book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder!

The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats)

The Copyediting for my book - to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication

The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this fall.

When I pre-sell 100 copies of my book, I will publish. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish an audiobook. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition.

 

 

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:
You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish

A Personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book

Your Name will appear in a Special, Acknowledgements Section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”)

Early access to the Introduction of my book and my entire manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback

The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my cover

I will do a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share experience the experiences of writing my book

And more...

About the Author

Tom Hine is founder and CEO of Capital Wealth Management, LLC a wealth management firm. He is a 4th-degree black belt in Shotokan karate and co-author of a previous book “NASD Arbitration Solution: 5 Black Belt "Principles to Protect and Grow your Financial Services Practice."

Tom has been in the investment and wealth management business since 1990, and over the last 15 years has interviewed over 50 firms and acquired 7 wealth management and investment companies.

I wrote this book because I wanted to provide a template and a road map for the baby boom generation of advisors who will be selling or merging their practices over the next 10 years.

Tom is an avid Boston sports fan who enjoys spending time with his family and friends. When he is not practicing martial arts or Yoga, he is often gathering material for his next big idea, perhaps even a sitcom.

For more information, you can connect with me at:

shodanpublications@gmail.com and
On Instagram: @tomjoseph2929
On Twitter: @laughoutloud69
On LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/hinetom/
On Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/tom.hine.73


Risks & Challenges
The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.


Other Ways You Can Help
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Please Share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family, and network. Please use #TomHinebook and tag me as well as my publisher,

@New Degree Press so we can help amplify your efforts.

You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page.

Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.

 

Thank you so much for all of your love and support!

Thomas J. Hine

Shodan Publications, LLC

story:
Story of My Book

Nova University imagines the future of higher education through the lens of the student experience.

My name is Wren Lee and I am the author of Nova University. I wrote this book to imagine a university that works on solving the current issues within higher education. As a student, I know about the experiences my friends and I have had with higher ed and how frustrated we get sometimes. I empathize with college students in the US and want to help them.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover new ways to approach higher education. I want you to see this book as an opportunity to kickstart a revolution within higher education. 

In this book, you'll encounter multifaceted dimensions of higher education and the student experience through concepts like:
  • Micro-housing
  • Competency-based education
  • Student-directed learning

You will love this book if you are currently or previously associated with an institution of higher education, if you want higher education to change, or if you enjoy thinking about the future.

Nova University speaks to current students, staff, and faculty and futurists who want to grapple with higher education and access and equity in higher education in a new way.

Ultimately, I hope that Nova University inspires reflection and fruitful dialogue, pressing into engaging questions like:
  • How might we help college students become aware, educated members of society?
  • How might we promote personal development and growth in universities?
  • How might we prepare college students for interdisciplinary, collaborative post-graduate work?
I look forward to exploring these questions and beyond with my readers. I believe discussing education equity, access, and higher education will change us all for the better. 
 

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:
  • The editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in August 2021.
  • The cover design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)
  • The layout design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).
  • The copy editing for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
  • The launch & promotion efforts for my book when I ultimately publish next summer.

When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish a paperback and ebook. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover and an audiobook.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:
  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish.
  • Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book.
  • You will receive early access to the Author’s Note and other excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback.
  • You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.
  • You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing i.
  • And much more!
 

About the Author

Wren Lee is a storyteller, designer, and activist using the power of storytelling to impact change.

As a current college student, they understand the difficulties of the current system of higher education and strive to improve the experience for future students. 

Outside of academics, they enjoy analyzing the complex world-building of Boku no Hero Academia and writing screenplays.

For more information, you can connect with them at wrenl@smu.edu and @beingwrenlee on Twitter and Instagram and https://www.linkedin.com/in/wrenlee LinkedIn.
 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by including the cost of mailing and shipping the signed copies into each pre-order tier. 

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.
 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help!

Please share my pre-sale campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #WrenLeeIsWritingABook and tag me (@beingwrenlee on Twitter and Instagram) as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so we can help amplify your efforts.

You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page.

Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it via text or direct message on social media.

Thank you so much for all of your love and support!

Sincerely,
Wren
